title: Psychedelic Preparation & Integration
subtitle: Making medicine work work
description: A comprehensive guide to preparing for, navigating, and integrating psychedelic experiences. This course covers physical and psychological preparation, navigation principles, and the crucial integration process that determines lasting benefit.

modules.title: Understanding Psychedelics
modules.description: What these substances are and how they work

modules.title: Navigation Principles
modules.description: How to work with the experience as it unfolds

modules.title: Immediate Integration
modules.description: The first 48 hours after an experience

modules.title: Long-Term Integration
modules.description: Making the insights stick for months and years

whatYouLearn: Understand how psychedelics affect the brain and psyche
Prepare physically and mentally for an experience
Navigate challenging material during the experience
Integrate insights in the immediate aftermath
Know when integration support is needed
requirements: This course is educational - all decisions about substances are your own
Prior inner work experience strongly recommended
Nervous System Mastery course helpful for regulation skills

questions.question: What is the most important factor in psychedelic outcomes?
options: How many times you've done it before

questions.question: What is 'intention' in preparation context?
options: Exactly what you want to experience
A genuine question or opening you bring, held loosely

questions.question: What is the core navigation principle during a psychedelic experience?
options: Surrender - let go, breathe, trust the process

questions.question: When difficult content arises, what helps most?
options: Breathing, relaxing the body, and moving toward rather than away

questions.question: What should you do in the first 24-48 hours after an experience?
options: Protect the space - journal, rest, avoid screens and stimulation

questions.question: Why do insights often fade without integration?
options: Insights need embodiment through action, practice, and changed behavior

questions.question: What is 'spiritual bypassing' in integration context?
options: Using insights to avoid doing real-world work on problems
